text: Valeriy Shmarov (; 14 August 1945 – 14 October 2018) was a Ukrainian politician. Valeriy Shmarov in Verkhovna Rada From 10 October 1994 to 8 July 1996 he was the third Minister of Defence of Ukraine. Order of President of Ukraine № 477/1994 "Regarding acting Minister of Defence of Ukraine" Order of President of Ukraine № 579/1994 "Regarding Minister of Defence of Ukraine" In 1998–2002 he was a People's Deputy of Ukraine. A member of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine Committee on defense and security. Shmarov died on 14 October 2018 at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Valeriy Shmarov
